title: PNB Housing sees growth emerging & affordable spaces: MD Girish Kousgi
description: PNB Housing Finance, backed by Carlyle, aims to grow its affordable loan book to ₹15,000 crore by FY27. Currently, the affordable housing sector contributes ₹2,500 crore. The lender plans to shift focus to high-yielding segments and expects its overall loan book to grow by 18% in the next three years.
